data.title: Darius Jones: Samesoul Maker and fLuXkit Vancouver
data.meta_description: Nov 21 – Saxophonist and composer Darius Jones bridges avant-jazz and contemporary composition with his two most iconic works.
data.text:
Tickets $30 Buy Tickets

ARTIST AS CURATOR

Curated by Darius Jones

Saxophonist and composer Darius Jones bridges the landscape between the New York avant-jazz scene and contemporary composition. He brings these musical worlds together for the first time at a performance featuring his two most iconic works in one night: Samesoul Maker and fLuXkit Vancouver.

Samesoul Maker for voices, bells and vibraphone transports listeners into a mythical alien world, creating a realm of sound, syntax and speech patterns expressing the hope and truth that real communication lies beyond the realm of words and the familiar. A radiant manifesto of artistic freedom, fLuXkit Vancouver was #1 on The Wire’s 2023 Best Jazz list and made NPR’s Top 50 of 2023.

Samesoul Maker

Gelsey Bell, voice and bell

Aviva Jaye, voice and bell

Sunder Ganglani, voice and bell

Paul Pinto, voice and bell

Levy Lorenzo, vibraphone

Marisha Roxanne Scott, visual artist

fLuXkit Vancouver

Darius Jones, alto saxophone

Gerald Cleaver, drums

Jesse Zubot, violin

Josh Zubot, violin

Peggy Lee, cello

James Meger, bass

Matti Nives, design
